item.title: 银行达成协议让澳大利亚现金速递公司继续运营
item.description: 澳大利亚的大型银行和杂货店同意向陷入困境的现金运输公司 Linfox Armaguard Pty Ltd. 注资 5,000 万澳元（3,300 万美元），此举将使纸币和硬币继续在经济领域流通。【原文：Large banks and grocers in Australia agreed to a deal to inject A$50 million ($33 million) into the struggling cash-transportation firm Linfox Armaguard Pty Ltd., a move that keeps bank notes and coins flowing around the economy.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 从铝到锌，基本金属将成为在香港举行的 LME 亚洲周年度会议的焦点。在未来几十年里，电动汽车将取代汽油车，最终将消耗大量能源。而俄罗斯天然气仍在欧洲占有一席之地。【原文：From aluminum to zinc, base metals will be in the spotlight during the annual LME Asia Week gathering in Hong Kong. item.title: 中国开发商凯撒重返法庭参加清算听证会
item.description: 很少有中国开发商能像凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）一样，象征着解决房地产债务危机的漫长道路。【原文：Few Chinese developers symbolize the long path to resolving the property debt crisis quite like Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd., which will be trying to fend off liquidation in a Hong Kong court Monday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 1 170 亿美元养老金引发更多房地产动荡
item.description: 澳大利亚第三大养老基金--规模达 1,750 亿澳元（1,170 亿美元）的 Aware Super 养老基金，正在全球房地产资产中狩猎，以期在本周结束的本财年强劲投资业绩的基础上再接再厉。【原文：Australia’s third-largest pension fund, A$175 billion ($117 billion) Aware Super, is hunting among global real-estate assets as it seeks to build on strong investment results from the financial year that ends this week.】

item.title: 高利率会持续多久？债券市场认为可能永远如此
item.description: 就在投资者对美国国债反弹即将起飞的乐观情绪日益高涨之际，债券市场的一个关键指标却发出了令人担忧的信号，让那些打算入市的投资者感到担忧。【原文：Just as optimism is growing among investors that a rally in US Treasuries is about to take off, one key indicator in the bond market is flashing a worrying sign for anyone thinking about piling in.】

item.title: 英伟达销售额增长之快令华尔街望尘莫及
item.description: Nvidia Corp. 是 S&P 500 指数中最昂贵的股票，其股价约为该公司未来 12 个月预计销售额的 23 倍。【原文：Nvidia Corp. is the most expensive stock in the S&P 500 Index, with its shares trading for roughly 23 times the company’s projected sales over the next 12 months.】

item.title: 大型食品公司试图用维生素和膳食抵消肥胖症药物的打击
item.description: 所谓的 "Ozempic 革命 "使食品和饮料公司的市值减少了数十亿美元。但是，新的减肥药至少给以前需求低迷的一个产品系列带来了动力：酸奶。【原文：The so-called Ozempic Revolution has wiped billions off the market value of food and drink companies. But new weight-loss drugs are giving a boost to at least one line of products that have sometimes previously faced sluggish demand: yogurt.】

item.title: OQ 化学公司削减贷款协议后将启动销售程序
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，OQ Chemicals GmbH 的阿曼所有者在与贷款人达成短期融资协议后，将启动该公司的销售程序。【原文：The Omani owner of OQ Chemicals GmbH is set to kick off a sales process for the business after the company reached a short-term financing deal with lenders, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国肖尔茨表示希望勒庞不要赢得法国大选
item.description: 德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）涉足法国政坛，表示希望玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民联盟（National Rally）不会在法国议会选举中获胜。【原文：German Chancellor Olaf Scholz waded into French politics by voicing his hopes that Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally won’t win the country’s parliamentary elections.】

item.title: 导致美国汽车经销商瘫痪的黑客攻击事件正在解决中
item.description: 目标供应商 CDK Global 表示，导致北美数千家汽车经销商业务停顿的软件黑客攻击事件目前正在解决过程中。【原文：A software hack that brought business to a halt at thousands of car dealerships in North America is now in the process of getting resolved, the targeted provider CDK Global said.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔称潜在冲击意味着欧洲央行不能预先承诺利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，新的通胀冲击风险意味着欧洲中央银行必须在利率问题上保持灵活性。【原文：The risk of new inflation jolts means that the European Central Bank has to stay flexible on interest rates, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: Binance 总法律顾问面临加密货币领域最严峻的挑战
item.description: Binance 的总法律顾问埃莉诺-休斯（Eleanor Hughes）有很多事情要忙，从这家巨型加密货币交易所与尼日利亚官员的激烈争执，到美国当局作为一项具有里程碑意义的认罪协议的一部分而实施的严格监控。【原文：Binance’s General Counsel Eleanor Hughes has a lot to keep her busy, ranging from the giant crypto exchange’s testy dispute with Nigerian officials to strict monitoring by US authorities as part of a landmark plea deal.】

item.title: 肖尔茨和米莱伊要求尽快就欧盟与南方共同市场自由贸易协定达成协议
item.description: 德国和阿根廷领导人呼吁尽快达成欧盟与四个南美经济体之间的一项重要贸易协议，该协议遭到了法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙的反对。【原文：The leaders of Germany and Argentina called for a swift conclusion to a major trade deal between the European Union and four South American economies that has been opposed by French President Emmanuel Macron.】

item.title: 曾经像 "瘟疫 "一样被避之不及的电磁持续时间又开始流行了
item.description: 新兴市场债务投资者再次转向长期债券，去年年底的一场热门押注在 2024 年的前几个月烧毁了许多投资者。【原文：Investors in emerging-market debt are once again turning to long-duration bonds, a popular bet at the end of last year that burnt many of them in the first months of 2024.】

item.title: 随着季风的推进，印度预测西海岸将出现暴雨

item.title: Engie 首席执行官称法国面临退出欧盟电力市场的停电风险

item.title: 英国下任首相面临大选后经济困境加剧的问题

item.title: 阿迪达斯首席执行官借桑巴热潮重振叶氏失败后的品牌
item.description: 无论德国队在未来三周的 2024 年欧洲杯上表现如何，东道主德国足球队及其最知名品牌之一的时代都将结束：德国队将穿着阿迪达斯队服进行最后一场欧洲杯比赛。【原文：No matter how Germany fares during Euro 2024 over the coming three weeks, an era of sorts will end for the host country’s football team and one of its best-known brands: Die Mannschaft will play its last European championship tournament match in Adidas uniforms.】

item.title: 股票交易者驾驭法国大选动荡指南

item.title: 富裕的拉美人和游客吸引了对马德里酒店的投资
item.description: 罗伯特-德尼罗（Robert De Niro）与他人共同创立的 Nobu Hospitality LLC 集团正在将马德里市中心的一栋办公楼改造成豪华酒店，而就在这栋办公楼的隔壁，一座标志性建筑本周被墨西哥投资者杰罗尼莫-布雷默（Jeronimo Bremer）的公司抢购，并有可能将其改造成五星级酒店。【原文：Just doors down from where the Robert De Niro co-founded group Nobu Hospitality LLC is transforming a central Madrid office building into a luxury hotel, an iconic edifice was snapped up this week by Mexican investor Jeronimo Bremer’s firm, potentially to turn it into a five-star lodge.】

item.title: 全球投资者对曾经最爱的日本股票转趋谨慎

item.title: 日本散户投资者关注日元干预的风险赌注
